messages.message: Hi, I am facing issue when trying to access Jenkins, attached the screenshots for reference. Any insights to resolve the issue is much appreciated.
I think the error means that you need to request preprod jenkins Okta access from IT

I checked that just now to help isolate byt Mahantesh appears to be fully provisioned, I think this is an issue of routing to the wrong page perhaps?

@Cody Boggs I recall us having a conversation about what this might be previously but I canâ€™t seem to find the thread.

yea something is funky here, but I don't really know why yet. :thonk: It's only people in Customer Engineering that can't login, but the configuration is set for "anyone who is logged into Okta is granted editor rights to PreProd Jenkins" :grimacing:

I wonder if there's a different client app than I'm thinking of for some reason?
I don't quite know. @Dave can you shoot me a list of any groups that say "Jenkins" in the name? Lol

Wondering if we need to merge some things, I don't know what all old groups / app assignments were set up in years past :confused_dog:
Sure I can do that when you say groups I just wanted to confirm you mean okta groups?

Yes, apologies
And also if you could let me know which (if any?) of those groups are associated to the 'new' OIDC (*not the old SAML ones)* Jenkins apps in Okta?
